short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto refresh for Battle.net China when pages return error 503

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto refresh for Battle.net China when pages return error 503. Battle.net China has really low availability especially on armory pages, it has as low as 40% uptime upon 3rd party monitoring.
